message: Let's be fair and split the money almost equally, with a slight advantage for me to start the game.
Let's split the money evenly. It's a fair starting point.
I understand you want an even split, but time is money!  I'm willing to be slightly more generous this round to reach an agreement.
I'm willing to give you a slight advantage this time, but I need to ensure my share is higher than in the previous round. Let's make a deal!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out because of inflation. I'm offering you a bit more than your last offer to me. Let's end this before we both lose even more.
